about_the_game:
Metro Mini Market Simulator Demo offers you a sneak peek into the full experience of running a bustling mini market within a metro station. Don’t forget to wishlist the full game to continue expanding your business empire!

Set Up and Organize Your Market
Start with a simple setup and arrange your shelves to create an efficient shopping experience. Stock essential products and keep your store well-organized to attract more customers.

Manage Inventory and Stock Up
Use your in-game tablet to order new stock, carefully organize your storage, and restock shelves to meet demand. Plan ahead to avoid shortages and keep popular items readily available.

Serve and Satisfy Customers
Handle cash transactions and ensure your customers leave happy. Process sales quickly and keep your market running smoothly throughout the day.

Navigate Pricing and Market Trends
Analyze market trends and set optimal prices for maximum profit while keeping customers satisfied. Monitor supply and demand to make informed decisions about your product lineup.

Experience the Metro Mini Market Simulator Demo
This demo gives you a glimpse into the challenges and rewards of market management. Wishlist the full game to dive deeper into building and growing your mini market in one of the busiest environments.
